name: Format\RepeatableImageFill
description: The object for adding a background image that can be repeated.

properties.name: URL
properties.description: The URL of the image file to use for filling the component.

properties.name: attachment
properties.description: A string that indicates how the fill should behave when a user scrolls.

properties.name: height
properties.description: The height of the image as it is repeated. When height is omitted, the width property is used to determine the size based on the aspect ratio of the provided image.

properties.name: horizontalAlignment
properties.description: A string that sets the horizontal alignment of the image fill within its component.

properties.name: repeat
properties.description: A string that defines the direction in which the background image is repeated.

properties.name: verticalAlignment
properties.description: The vertical alignment of the repeatable image fill within its component.

properties.name: width
properties.description: The width of the image as it is repeated. When width is omitted, the height property is used to determine the size based on the aspect ratio of the provided image.
